string.name: name
string.value: Tigun the Guard at the Palace
The palace of #m260000000# boasts some tight security, but you really want to go in. Talk to the head of palace security, #b#p2101004##k, for help.

#p2101004# flat out says he can't let you in the palace...unless you show your allegiance to the Sultan by paying mesos. #b2,000 mesos#k isn't much, but you hate dealing with corrupt officials like this.
After you gave #p2101004# 2,000 mesos, you received the pass to the palace. Even though you feel dirty about it, at least you can enter the palace now.
뭐야, 넌? 왜 궁전 앞을 기웃거리지? 이곳은 아무나 들어갈 수 있는 곳이 아니야! #m260000000#의 술탄께서 계시는 곳이라고! 뭐? 궁전에 들어가고 싶다고? 너 같은 외부의 모험가를 어떻게 믿고 들여보내라는 거야? 절대 안돼! 하지만...
왕성에 꼭 들어가고 싶다면, 들어가게 해줄 수도 있지. 네가 술탄에게 충성한다는 표시를 보인다면, 뭐 들여보내 줄 수도 있어. 어떻게 하면 되냐고? 험험. 그거야 간단하지. #b2000메소#k만 내. #m260000000#와 술탄을 위한 충성의 표시로 말이야.
뭐야? 2000메소 내기가 싫다는 거야? 혹시라도 술탄에게 반역할 생각인 건 아니겠지? 메소가 없다면 당장 꺼져!

Hey, what are you doing snooping around the palace? This is where the Sultan of #m260000000# resides! What? You want to enter? Why would I let a traveler like you do that? No way will I let you in, unless…

If you really, really want to enter the palace, then there might be a way. You need to show your allegiance to the Sultan. How, you ask? That's easy. Just hand me #b2,000 mesos#k. As your way of paying respect to Sultan and #m260000000#, of course.
What? You don't want to pay 2,000 mesos? Then scram before I arrest you!
Alright, alright. I can see now that you're someone who pays allegiance to the Sultan, so I'll give you this #t4031582#. Be thankful I'm feeling generous today.
If you lose the #t4031582# by any chance, then come see me. I'll give you another one...for #b2,000 mesos#k.
Hey, you're short on mesos! If you want to enter the palace, the least you can do is give a good faith offering of #b2,000 mesos#k.
